Name: Space Haters
About the game: Space Haters is a tough as nails vertical shoot 'em up featuring classic arcade-style gameplay and set in the ruthless world of intergalactic music You play as Photon who, after another sell-out gig, has once again asserted his galactic lyrical dominance . He gets word his friend Gamma-Boi is organizing the ultimate after-party in his honor. However, it is not going to be easy to reach. The other musical artists want a shot at the top and will do anything to get there. However, to Photon, they are just Haters. Space Haters. It is up to Photon to blast through the so-called 'Monarchs of Music' and reach the afterparty of the light-year, and of course, look good whilst doing it. Features Vertical shoot 'em up action Tough-as-nails , single-life arcade gameplay from Lindsay Cox Global leaderboards to assert your galactic dominance Spectacular, visually-striking 2D-artwork by Tudor Morris A soundtrack of intergalatic awesomeness composed by the legendary Ross Gordon Battle the Monarchs of Music in heart-pounding boss battles Xbox One/Xbox 360 Controller and headphones are strongly recommended Remember to add to wishlist!
